mapper.update: update auction set a_price=#{aPrice} where a_num=#{aNum}
mapper.select: select a.a_num, p.p_num, s.s_file, s.s_name, sz.size_category_name, a.a_price from sizes sz, stock s, product p, auction a where a.id=#{id} and sz.size_category_num=s.size_category_num and s.s_num = p.s_num and p.p_num=a.p_num and p.p_status=4

select a.a_num, p.p_num, s.s_file, s.s_name, sz.size_category_name, a.a_price, am.max_price "max_price", p.p_status from sizes sz, stock s, product p, auction a, a_max am where a.id=#{id} and sz.size_category_num=s.size_category_num and s.s_num = p.s_num and p.p_num=a.p_num and p.p_num=am.p_num and p.p_status in (6, 7, 8)
